Class InventoryUtil

    • playerInventoryToBase64

      public static String[] playerInventoryToBase64(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.inventory.PlayerInventory playerInventory) throws IllegalStateException
      Convert the player inventory to a base64 string.
      Parameters:
      playerInventory - The player inventory to convert.
      Returns:
      A String array, the first element is the main content, the second element is the armor.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the inventory cannot be converted.

      Returns:

      Throws:
